name: expense-tracker
description: expense-tracker ede w swiv depans ou fasil epi jere lajan ou pi byen chak jou.

name: glowHabit
description: GlowHabit ede w bati epi swiv bon abitid chak jou.

name: currency
description: Currency se yon aplikasyon pou konvèti lajan an tan reyèl, ak yon entèfas presi, rapid, epi fasil pou itilize.

name: calculator
description: Calculator se yon aplikasyon rapid ak presi pou fè kalkil chak jou fasil.

name: xuper
description: App pou decouvri api swiv fim ou renmen yo fasil.

name: windowcalc
description: App pou kalkile cotizaciones fenèt an poulgadas, rapid e offline.

name: fitness-tracker
description: Fitnes Tracker se yon app pou swiv aktivite fizik ak pwogrè sante ou chak jou.
